content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ms. Wang. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both our needs. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student and I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking of 300 Euros per month. It's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment, don't you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 300 Euros per month is certainly a budget-friendly option, but considering the prime location of the apartment in the city center, I believe it could fetch a higher price. However, I'm willing to negotiate. How does 350 Euros sound to you? It's a decent compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see what you mean. But considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and my student status, it's not a budget I can easily afford. Would you be willing to reconsider?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your financial constraints as a student, but the location of this apartment is very attractive, and it's newly built. I'm sure you'll find it a comfortable and convenient place to live. How about we meet halfway? 400 Euros per month is a fair price for both parties, in my opinion. It's still lower than the market value for this area.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a fair compromise. I agree to the price of 400 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Ms. Wang. I agree to the price of 400 Euros per month. We have a deal! Is there anything else we need to discuss?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. That's all for now. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Ms. Wang. I'm sure you'll be very happy in the apartment. We'll need to sign a lease agreement, but I'll take care of all the paperwork. Is there anything specific you would like to include in the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I'm satisfied with the standard lease agreement. I just need to make sure that the apartment is in good condition when I move in.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Absolutely, Ms. Wang. I'll ensure that the apartment is in excellent condition before you move in. Once the lease is ready, I'll contact you to sign it. Is there anything else you need assistance with regarding the move?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, everything is in order. Thank you for your help, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Ms. Wang. I'm here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Enjoy your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
